author: rse
msg: One more available patch for the 1.3.1-dev cycle.

author: rse
msg: Consequently write shell variables as "${name}" instead of "$name", especially
to avoid problems in some brain-dead Bourne-shell variants when something like
"$conf-dist" is used which now is written more safe as "${conf}-dist".
